code: import React from'react';import ShoppingListCard from'./ShoppingListCard';import{Row,Col,Alert}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShoppingListsContainer=_ref=>{let{lists,currentUser,onDeleteList}=_ref;if(lists.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Alert,{variant:"info",className:"text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:"No shopping lists yet"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-0",children:"Create your first shopping list to get started!"})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"shopping-lists-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:lists.map(list=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{xl:4,lg:6,md:6,className:"mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ShoppingListCard,{id:list.id,name:list.name,memberCount:list.members.length,itemCount:list.items.length,isOwner:list.ownerId===currentUser.id,onDelete:()=>onDeleteList(list.id)})},list.id))})});};export default ShoppingListsContainer;
